authors: [Allison Horst]
date: "2019-09-16"
title: Quantitative skills and R/RStudio workshop for incoming Bren PhD students
---

An intensive 7-day workshop to refresh quantitative skills (quantitative thinking, algebra, calculus, probability, hypothesis testing, regress) and introduce PhD students to reproducible code and workflows in R and RStudio.
